<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Giant Slayer](/Feats.aspx?ID=3904) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Kingmaker</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 24</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Giant Hunter](/Feats.aspx?ID=3900)

</column>

---

Your well-placed blows can fell mighty giants. If you critically hit the same [giant](/Traits.aspx?ID=79) twice on the same turn, the target must succeed at a Fortitude saving throw or die. Use your class DC for this saving throw.

<title level="2">Adventuring with Ekundayo</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 23</row>

Ekundayo eventually develops his own methods to pursue his favored enemies—giants. Once he gains the Magical Crafting feat at 4th level, he begins to craft specialized ammunition and runes for weapons. As long as his attitude toward the PCs is at least friendly, he shares these discoveries with them, unlocking the following ranger class feats and items as soon as his level equals the level of the feat or item.

**Related Feats**: [Giant Hunter](/Feats.aspx?ID=3900), [Hamstringing Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=3902), [Roll with It (Ranger)](/Feats.aspx?ID=3903), [The Harder They Fall (Ranger)](/Feats.aspx?ID=3901)
